regen.absent_element: handling of faults during Continuous BIT operation
regen.new_specification: The system shall handle faults that occur during Continuous BIT operation, ensuring the watchdog timer is reset within the allotted time to prevent processor reset.

regen.absent_element: handling of faults during Continuous BIT operation
regen.new_specification: The system shall handle faults that occur during Continuous BIT operation within the 3ms time limit.

regen.absent_element: handling of fault conditions during Continuous BIT execution
regen.new_specification: The system shall handle faults detected during Continuous BIT execution within the 3ms time limit and notify Redundancy Management and Scheduler operations accordingly.

label: Continuous BIT shall take less than 3 milliseconds while processing faults.
